text:
March 11, 19$9
Mr. Marshall McLuhan, Chairman
Culture and Communications Seminar
29 Wells Hill Avenue
Toronto 10, Ontario, Canada
Dear Marshalls
We should be pulling revision together any day now. Will take
close to a week to process (mimeo, get Harley signatures, etc.)
and I111 be away late in March. So send revisions and rewritten
procedure section soon as possible*
I noted you were planning to go over this with CBC and Extension
staff a couple of weeks ago â€” and have been on the go. It should
be mailed from here (if it*s to meet April 1 deadline) by about
March 27.
Sincerely,
HJS:JO
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
